coverage.notes: The images provide a good view of the vase's exterior and a partial view of the base, but lack a macro shot of any markings on the base for clear identification.

image_assessments.notes: Shows the base with a mark, but there is some glare making details hard to read.
Clear view of the front of the vase.
View showing the top and part of the body of the vase.
Clear back view of the vase.

missing_high_value_views.why_it_matters: A close-up can reveal signature details and marks crucial for identification.
missing_high_value_views.how_to_shoot: Use macro mode, focus closely on the mark area using good lighting to minimize glare.

missing_high_value_views.why_it_matters: A macro shot of the signature can help in clear identification.
missing_high_value_views.how_to_shoot: Focus closely with a steady camera in macro mode to capture the signature sharply.
